subject: Verify regex correctness
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Run the regex verification script to confirm the new pattern matches all expected naming conventions and rejects non-integration patterns.

**Verification:**
- type: manual-check
- command: `node -e "const re = /\.integration[.\-](test|spec)\.(ts|tsx)$/; console.log(re.test('foo.integration.test.ts'), re.test('foo.integration.spec.ts'), re.test('foo.integration-test.ts'), re.test('foo.integration-spec.ts'), re.test('foo.integration.test.tsx'), re.test('foo.test.ts'), re.test('foo.spec.ts'));"`
- expected: `true true true true true false false`

verification.command: node -e "const re = /\.integration[.\-](test|spec)\.(ts|tsx)$/; console.log(re.test('foo.integration.test.ts'), re.test('foo.integration.spec.ts'), re.test('foo.integration-test.ts'), re.test('foo.integration-spec.ts'), re.test('foo.integration.test.tsx'), re.test('foo.test.ts'), re.test('foo.spec.ts'));"
verification.expected: true true true true true false false
